description: REST APIs are the language of the web. Though simple to build, it's also very easy to mess them up. You end up with a convoluted API, that's hard to understand and even worse to use. I want to show you how to create REST APIs that are both comprehensible are maintainable and make your fellow developers happy.

title: Devoxx Poland 2016 - Clemens Prerovsky - REST in Peace
